page.title: 05WORLD OF WORK.
page.content: In Rainham there are 3 types of employment in three main catagories: London commuting,those employed in the Rainham area and those employed in the surrounding towns. The local employment can be split into the {service industry},including shopworkers estate agents,banks, and building societies, those linked with the transport network in the surrounding urban areas and a few remaining agricultural workers.Rainham has a lack of{manufacturing industries} with only one brickworks and some light engineering. Because of this lack of industry in the area unemploymnet is about 13%. Most of those concerned with various occupations live in the SW of the area whereas a strip along the N and NE is almost entirely agricultural.
